document_data.name: Crosse
document_data.mainbody:
Fist '''Crosse''' was a member of the [[Flaming Fist]] mercenary company from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|''Distract the Gauntlet will you? I think she's set on killing me.''|Fist Crosse}}
document_data.Description: Crosse was a [[human]] man with tan skin and mousy-colored hair. His face was decorated with black paint or black [[tattoo]]s. The man's blue eyes shone from under his Fist uniform [[helmet]]. He wore a set of [[chainmail]] armor decorated with a [[tabard]] embroidered with the Flaming Fist insignia. Crosse wielded a [[halberd]] when on duty.
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Fist Crosse was stationed in the [[Basilisk Gate]]'s barracks and prison, serving under Blaze [[Liara Portyr]] and [[Manip Seyama]]. His Gauntlet supervisor forced Crosse to train half to death.
.
